sentences.sentence: Can anyone tell me the difference between hollandaise and bearnaise sauce?
sentences.translation: 谁能告诉我荷兰酸味蘸酱贝纳斯酱的差别？

sentences.sentence: He cuts off the tips of his asparagus starter and dips them in the accompanying sauce which he declares to be halfway between bearnaise and custard.
sentences.translation: 他切下开胃菜芦笋的尖，蘸上与之搭配的调味汁，他宣称这种调味汁的味道介于蛋黄酱和奶油蛋羹之间。
